dev.williamchung.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.williamchung.services.UserService

  • public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the UserService class which liaises between the servlet and repository dao. Each method is explained below.

      Checks if a given Username and Password authenticates a valid user.

      Grabs the User from Repo by an Id from the Servlet.

      void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository) 
      java.lang.Boolean usernameAvailable(java.lang.String username)

        public User getUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Grabs the User from Repo by a Username from the Servlet.
        Parameters:
        username - is passed by the Servlet
        Returns:
        returns a User object.

      • getUserById

        public User getUserById(java.lang.Integer id)
        Grabs the User from Repo by an Id from the Servlet.
        Parameters:
        id - is passed by the Servlet.
        Returns:
        returns a User object.

      • authenticateUser

        public java.lang.Boolean authenticateUser(java.lang.String username,
                                          java.lang.String password)
        Checks if a given Username and Password authenticates a valid user.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password - username and password are passed from the Servlet.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean true or false whether a User with given username was found and if the password matched.

      • usernameAvailable

        public java.lang.Boolean usernameAvailable(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if an User with the given username already exists, for Registration purposes (Username must be unique).
        Parameters:
        username - from Servlet
        Returns:
        a boolean whether the unique username is available.

      • registerUser

        public User registerUser(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Registers a user by saving a new User object into the database.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password - is passed by the Servlet.
        Returns:
        returns a User object with the id generated by the database if successful.
